titleStmt.title: A Motion humbly presented to the consideration of the honourable, the committee of the high court of Parliament consisting of 18 queres concerning the Booke of common-prayer : October 8, 1641 : as also an honourable speech made by Mr. Pymme.
titleStmt.author: Pym, John, 1584-1643.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
This work is found as Wing M2939 at reel 255:E.172, no. 29, and as Wing P4272 (number cancelled in Wing CD-ROM, 1996) at reel 1099:10.
Reproduction of originals in the Thomason Collection, British Library, and the Cambridge University Library.
